name: Loop Theory
description:
Immerse yourself in the game created on the Unreal Engine 5. Solve puzzles, make your way through various rooms, use objects and find out more about the fate of the main character.

Average time to complete the game: 45 minutes



This is a story-oriented horror game. Take part in the mysterious investigation of the crimes of the most ordinary family. The narrative in the game does not provide direct answers related to the paranormal story of the main character, so you will have to collect the missing pieces of the puzzle yourself. Will you be able to get answers to questions about your character's past and present? During the passage of the plot, you will come across notes and inscriptions, study them!

Waiting for you:
- A mysteriously changing house
- Riddles
- An ambiguous plot

ATTENTION: The game contains images of violent scenes that can have a negative impact on the psyche.
